name: The Forgotten Ones - Choo Choo Charles Fan Game
name_original: The Forgotten Ones - Choo Choo Charles Fan Game
description:
The Forgotten Ones is a fan game for Choo Choo Charles, made by one person. All Choo Choo Charles assets belong to Two Star Games. 

---------------------------------------------------------------

Hello my name is ItsJustJord, I am a YouTuber who creates videos on video games mainly focusing on theory videos. In my spare time I often like to dabble in game development, and well here is my latest project. I hope you enjoyed it, I for sure had fun making it. If you would like to follow my future work follow the links below.  Big shout out to Gavin from Two Star Games for allowing me to do this project, all his links can be found at the bottom of the page with the Choo Choo Charles links! 

My Links;

YouTube| Twitter |Itch.io

Play as one of the surviving miners left in the mines after the collapse. When Warren left his men to die a few survived and did what they could to hold out in this mysterious mine, but they quickly found out they were not alone. Discover new locations and unforgettable game bugs sites that Warren failed to mention. 

Speak to the other Miners and get their story on why they are down there, with fully voiced characters where each has their own quirks. Using models from the original games, reimagined. 

Listen as they tell you tales of the creatures that lurk deeper in the mine. 

Do what you can to survive, who knows if you'll ever make it out.  

Collect Ammo, Health and Scrap to help aid your journey. 

---------------------------------------------------------------


Introducing some replayability for the game, wave mode is essentially "horde mode", where you fight an infinite amount of waves of enemies and see how long you can last. 

You'll need to find resources fast, from dying enemies or items scattered around, either way, this is your final fight. 

---------------------------------------------------------------

Move - W,A,S,D

Look - Mouse

Jump - Space

Interact - E

Shoot - Left Mouse Button

---------------------------------------------------------------

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
    MINIMUM:
    • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
    • Processor: 2.5 GHz Quad-core Intel or AMD processor
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD
    • Storage:1 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: The game is not optimized for lower-end graphics cards/hardware,  play at your own risk. 

---------------------------------------------------------------

Support the REAL Choo Choo Charles!

Get Choo Choo Charles - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1766740/ChooChoo_Charles/

Navigate an open-world island in an old train, upgrade it over time, and use it to fight an evil spider train named Charles.
